segments.text: Hey , John ! What do you think are the main causes of war today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say ! But it seems that a lot of wars nowadays are civil wars . People from different ethnic groups in the same country sometimes fight for power in that country .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , several of those civil wars have been going on for years and years . It seems they will never end .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you think they could be ended ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think that there is any easy way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think one better way to stop it is to cut off their financial support .
segments.speaker: S2
